title: Marketplace Roundtable #38: Marine Money Pt. 3 With J Mintzmyer
description: J Mintzmyer of Value Investor's Edge concludes his review of Marine Money in our third podcast on the subject. We spoke Friday morning, and go back into the IMO 2020 discussions to hear what industry insiders are saying and one divergent approach to the regulation that J is watching. J also shares a segment by segment breakdown of the industry, and we hit one more time on the theme that it might be darkest right before the dawn.
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We wrap up our Marine Money coverage by talking about IMO 2020, a segment by segment breakdown, and how the sector is taking its medicine
